dashboard.manageExpenses: Add, edit, and manage your expenses

analytics.description: Visualize your spending patterns with charts and statistics

expenses.title: My Expenses
expenses.pageDescription: Manage all your expenses in one place
expenses.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this expense? This action cannot be undone.
expenses.addConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to add this expense?
expenses.editConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to save these changes?

chat.title: Quick Add
chat.description: Add expenses quickly using conversational AI
chat.inputPlaceholder: Type a message or describe an expense...
chat.welcomeMessage: Hi! I'm your expense assistant. You can tell me about your expenses, and I'll help you log them. Try saying something like "I spent $50 on groceries today"
chat.errorMessage: Sorry, something went wrong. Please try again.

mockResponses.response1: Got it! I've recorded your expense of $50 on groceries. Would you like to add any more details?
mockResponses.response2: Thanks for sharing! I've added a $25 lunch expense to your records. Anything else?
mockResponses.response3: Perfect! Your coffee expense of $5 has been logged. Need to add more?
mockResponses.response4: I've recorded your transportation cost of $15. Would you like to categorize it further?
mockResponses.response5: Great! Your entertainment expense of $40 has been added. What else can I help you with?

chat.voiceResponse: I've recorded your dinner expense of $30. Would you like to specify which restaurant?
chat.fileResponse: I can see your receipt! It looks like a $45 expense at a restaurant. Should I add this to your records?
chat.cancelMessage: No problem! Feel free to describe another expense.

members.title: Members
members.name: Name
members.confirmRemove: Are you sure you want to remove this member?

groups.roleChangeConfirmation: The member's permissions will be updated immediately after changing their role.
groups.cannotChangeOwnerRole: The Owner role cannot be changed. To transfer ownership, please contact support.

roleDescriptions.owner: Full control over the group, including deleting the group and managing all members
roleDescriptions.admin: Can manage members, invite new members, and edit group settings
roleDescriptions.member: Can add, edit, and delete own expenses, and view group expenses
roleDescriptions.viewer: Can only view group expenses, cannot make changes

errors.nameTooShort: Group name must be at least 3 characters
errors.nameTooLong: Group name must not exceed 100 characters

invitation.title: Invite Members
invitation.messagePlaceholder: Add a personal message to the invitation
invitation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
invitation.maxUsesInvalid: Max uses must be a positive number

dashboard.title: Group Management
dashboard.noGroupDescription: Groups allow you to share expenses and manage them together with your team or family.
dashboard.authRequiredMessage: Please log in to view and manage groups.
dashboard.notMemberMessage: You are not a member of this group.
dashboard.deleteGroupConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this group? All data will be lost and this action cannot be undone.
